title: Leona Lewis - Spirit [2007][CD+Music Video+CD Covers]192Kbps
description:
LEONA LEWIS - SPIRIT, album released UK November 12th 2007.
Encoded 192Kbps [Lame] mp3. Covers included.

Leona Louise Lewis [born April 3rd 1985 in Islington, London] is an English singer-songwriter and winner of the third series of the popular television talent show The X Factor. Her debut single, &#039;A Moment like This&#039;, was released on December 20th 2006. The single was also available as a digital download from midnight on December 17th and broke a world record after it was downloaded fifty thousand times in thirty minutes. Her debut album, &#039;Spirit&#039;, was released on 12 November 2007. It is claimed Lewis will be the first winner of a major television talent show in both the UK and U.S. to be given a major global launch with the release of the album.

2006 X-Factor winner Leona Lewis&#039;s long-awaited debut LP &#039;Spirit&#039; comes nearly a year after her first single, &#039;A MomentLike This&#039;. Preceded by &#039;Bleeding Love&#039;, this release sees Lewis collaborating with a wealth of different producers andwriters [as well as the ubiquitous Simon Cowell as executive producer] including Damon Dash and Ne-Yo. The sound ranges from slick RnB pop to power ballads, finding room as well for a delicate version of Ewan Macoll&#039;s &#039;The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face&#039;. Lewis herself was heavily involved in the writing process, sharing credits on several of the songs on &#039;Spirit&#039;.
